recommendations.title: Optimize EC2 Instance Usage
recommendations.description: Evaluate the current EC2 instance type and consider using a smaller instance type or spot instances to reduce costs.
steps: Review current EC2 instance usage and performance metrics.
Test with a smaller instance type or spot instances.
Monitor performance and adjust as needed.

recommendations.title: Optimize RDS Instance Usage
recommendations.description: Evaluate the current RDS instance type and consider using a smaller instance type or read replicas to reduce costs.
steps: Review current RDS instance usage and performance metrics.
Test with a smaller instance type or read replicas.
Monitor performance and adjust as needed.

recommendations.title: Optimize CloudFront Usage
recommendations.description: Optimize CloudFront by enabling caching for static assets and using a smaller distribution size.
steps: Enable caching for static assets.
Review and optimize CloudFront distribution settings.

recommendations.title: Optimize Elasticache Usage
recommendations.description: Evaluate the current Elasticache instance type and consider using a smaller instance type or optimizing cache usage.
steps: Review current Elasticache usage and performance metrics.
Test with a smaller instance type or optimize cache usage.
Monitor performance and adjust as needed.

recommendations.title: Optimize ElasticBeanstalk Usage
recommendations.description: Optimize ElasticBeanstalk by using auto-scaling policies and adjusting environment settings to better match usage patterns.
steps: Review current ElasticBeanstalk environment settings.
Implement auto-scaling policies.
Monitor performance and adjust as needed.

recommendations.title: Use Open-Source Alternatives for Monitoring
recommendations.description: Consider using open-source monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana to reduce CloudWatch costs.
steps: Evaluate open-source monitoring tools.
Set up and configure Prometheus and Grafana.
Monitor and adjust configurations as needed.

recommendations.title: Optimize S3 Storage
recommendations.description: Optimize S3 storage by using lifecycle policies to move infrequently accessed data to cheaper storage classes.
steps: Review current S3 storage usage.
Set up lifecycle policies to move data to cheaper storage classes.

recommendations.title: Optimize Lambda Usage
recommendations.description: Optimize Lambda functions by reducing the memory allocation and improving function efficiency.
steps: Review current Lambda function usage and performance metrics.
Optimize function code and reduce memory allocation.
Monitor performance and adjust as needed.
